name: "Supergirl" Season 2 Episode 5 Multiple Choice Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who was hired to be James Olsen's assistant?
questions.explanation:
Eve Teschmacher.

	Eve was hired to fill in as the CatCo CEO's assistant. That was the job Kara had before moving on to become a journalist. She was played by Andrea Brooks.

questions.text: What name was given to Mon-El as he was allowed to wander out into the real world?
questions.explanation:
Mike.

	Kara got him a fake birth certificate, social security card and other documents to prove he was a real human. He was released from DEO custody into Kara's care.

questions.text: Maggie Sawyer and her boyfriend broke up during the episode.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Maggie's girlfriend dumped her, not a boyfriend, after telling Maggie that she was self-centered and worked too much. Alex Danvers said that wasn't such a bad thing. The ending of Maggie's relationship paved the way for Alex to pursue dating her, as the obvious spark had been there for the past two episodes.

Intern.

	Kara and James got him a spot as an intern with CatCo. He wasn't very good at it at first. He kept trying to use his powers to do the work, and wasn't fitting in on Earth in general.

questions.text: James dressed up in a costume and tried to fight crime.
questions.explanation:
True.

	He covered his face with a hoodie and facemask and used a baseball bat to try and take down the crew that was using alien guns to attack places in National City. His costume was mostly purple. His first attempt saw him take out two guy before they were able to turn their guns on him, but he quickly lost once the guns were being used.

questions.text: What organization was giving out alien technology to criminals?
questions.explanation:
Cadmus.

	The same organization that was fighting against allowing aliens to live on the planet, was using their own technology to get criminals to fight the aliens. Cadmus is also the group that had Jeremiah Danvers locked up somewhere working for them.

questions.text: What did Mon-El say he missed while at Lena Luthor's party?
questions.explanation:
Dancing.

	Kara said they used to dance on Krypton as well. The two then ended up dancing together before the party was crashed by robbers with ray guns.

questions.text: Who did Winn help assemble a machine to destroy the alien weapons?
questions.explanation:
Lena.

	Her party had been a ruse to convince the gang to come there. Once the gang was there, Lena was unable to get her machine working. Winn found her working on it, and together they got it working just as all three weapons were firing on Supergirl.

questions.text: What happened to the three gang members after they were arrested?
options: It wasn't shown in this episode.
They were sentenced to life in prison.
questions.explanation:
They were killed.

	The Cadmus director used a device to speak directly into the minds of the three criminals. She told them that she warned them not to get caught, and they they each fell over dead. The Cadmus director was Lillian Luthor, the mother of Lex and Lena.

questions.text: Who apologized to Mon-El for not believing in him?
questions.explanation:
Kara.

	She told him that she was sorry to trying to impose her will on him. She said his life is likely going to be very different that hers and that was ok. Then she promised to support him in whatever he chose to do.
